attributes.action: Prevent the closure of BBC radio station 6 music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 6 music is enjoyed by 700,000 people a week and it is growing by 12% per annum. It provides a service not replicated by any other radio station. The listeners are people who are passionate about music and it should not be closed!

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
